headline: A Fresh Look at PTC (PTC) Valuation Following Key Partnership Expansion and Strong Earnings Outlook
summary: PTC (PTC) has announced a significant expansion of its collaboration with Garrett Motion, as Garrett adopts new PTC cloud-based software solutions to enhance engineering and support its shift toward AI-driven product development. See our latest analysis for PTC. PTC’s push into cloud-based product lifecycle management and robust quarterly results have not stopped the share price from sliding in recent months, with a 1-month share price return of -15.9% and a total shareholder return of -8.2%...

headline: PTC Expands Relationship with Garrett Motion to Transform New Product Development
summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) today announced an expansion of its relationship with Garrett Motion, a leading differentiated technology provider for emission reduction and energy efficiency in automotive and beyond. Building on its successful use of the PTC Onshape® cloud-native computer-aided design (CAD) and product data management (PDM) platform, Garrett is adopting the PTC Codebeamer+™ application lifecycle management (ALM) and Windchill+® product lifecycle management (PLM) solutions as it continues a S

headline: How Strong 2025 Results and Upbeat Outlook at PTC (PTC) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: PTC Inc. recently reported its fourth quarter and full-year results for the period ended September 30, 2025, with quarterly revenue reaching US$893.8 million and net income of US$354.83 million, while also issuing earnings and revenue guidance for fiscal 2026. Strong year-over-year improvements in revenue and profitability, alongside detailed financial projections for the upcoming year, provide greater insight into the company's operational momentum and future targets. We'll examine how...

headline: Cathie Wood Says Software Is the Next Big AI Opportunity -- Here's 1 Super Stock You'll Regret Not Buying in 2026 If She's Right
summary: The dip in PTC's price has created a great opportunity to buy into a long-term growth story.
